job.title: Software Developer/Engineer
job.description: pstrongPOSITION SUMMARYstrongppIf you are a software developerengineer who enjoys problem solving enhancing existing products and creating new ones Vistage has an opportunity for you As a valued member of a small geographically distributed team you will make significant meaningful contributions to our member facing platform nbspThis position reports to the Manager Software Engineering ppstrongnbspstrongppstrongTHE COMPANYstrongppVistage is the worlds largest CEO coaching and peer advisory organization for small and midsize business SMB leaders We offer the most effective approach for SMB enterprises to achieve better results and grow faster as well as for SMB leaders to maximize their impactnbspppThe 22000 members we serve are CEOs owners and executives of SMB organizations located across the US and in 22 counties around the worldnbspThese SMB executives typically spend a day or more with Vistage every month to immerse themselves in our comprehensive platform for making better decisions getting better results and becoming better leaders Our platform features three core elements valuable perspectives from a trusted group of peers professional guidance and meeting facilitation from an accomplished business leader the Chair and deep insights from subject matter expertsppVistage was founded more than 60 years ago and weve grown every year since then by innovating to stay on the cuttingedge of business and being relentless in delivering value to our membersnbspOur success is demonstrated by the fact that Vistage member companies grow 22 times faster than nonVistage peer companiesnbspLearn more about us at wwwvistagecomppbrppstrongVISTAGE EMPLOYEE LIFEstrongppVistages success is anchored by a unique culture which reinforces employee commitment to the Vistage mission It is a spirit of collective success and achievement which is also reflected in our workplacenbspHeres a sample of the employee experience that helps drive our successppstrongnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWelcome to our homestrongnbspOur US headquarters sits in the heart of San Diegos UTC areanbspIt features an open modern aesthetic with lots of collaboration spaces free lattes and Kombucha on tapnbspFrom our San Diego base we collaborate with colleagues based across the country and around the worldppstrongnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWe sweat the detailsstrongnbspOur onsite gym is decked out with Peloton bikes a Mirror workout system and plenty of other equipment to keep your workout challenging and freshnbspOnsite yoga classes chair massages and smoothie days also help to keep us focused and healthyppstrongnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWe invest in your careerstrongnbspEach employee has an actionable career progression plan developed through individual collaboration with their managernbspWe focus on promoting from within and employee progression plans are complemented by allstaff development days held in our stateoftheart learning center as well as access to tons of individualized development resources and a tuition reimbursement programppstrongnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWe invest in youstrongnbspOur employee benefits program is one of the most generous youll findnbspFullypaid healthcare is provided for employees through Anthem Blue Cross along with access to dental vision and life insurance coveragenbspTake care of your financial future with 401k matching funds eligibility after your first month as an employee and utilize the free individual investment counseling we provide to help you grow the money youve savednbspYoull also start with 16 days of paid time off per year to allow you to relax and recharge    employees receive additional annual paid days off based on tenureppstrongnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWe keep it funstrongnbspWhether youre enjoying our summer baseball outing unwinding during an employee happy hour or toasting your coworkers at our epic annual holiday party youll see that we take having fun as seriously as helping our members succeednbspThe office vibe is business casual with flexible schedules along with freedom to work from home in bunny slippers if thats your thingnbspWe value mutual respect and laughter    we hate stiff formalitynbspYoull have regular access to Vistage executivesour CEO even buys everyone doughnuts several times a year to fuel his informal employee chatsnbspppstrongnbspstrongppVistages culture and sense of mission drives employee loyalty more than half of our staff has been with the company for five years or longernbspAre you ready to start your Vistage journeyppnbspppstrongWHAT WE ARE LOOKING FORstrongpulliEnthusiastic multidisciplinary developerengineer to deliver quality software on time and on budgetliliAble to easily transition between technologies and tasks as need arisesliliExcels at working independently as well as collaborativelyliliStrong and effective written and verbal communication skillsliliEager to continue developing technological analytical and design skillsliulpnbspppnbspppstrongRESPONSIBILITIESstrongpulliTroubleshoot implement fixes and new features for existing applications by writing code using various programming languagesliliParticipate in design and implementation of new applications and prototypesliliParticipate in collaborative design sessionsliliSupport production deploymentsliliCode review software components developed by team members to ensure they meet standards specifications and featuresliliComply with good software engineering principles including but not limited to architecture coding standards extensibility mobile compatibility performance and securityliliMaintain field of expertise through continuing education research seminars and professional associationsliulpnbspppnbspppstrongEXPERIENCEnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspstrongpulliMust have 35 years implementing web applications Must have demonstrated strong performance in prior roles with increasing levels of responsibility and independenceliliExpertise in software designarchitecture with understanding of design patterns data structures and multithreadingliulpnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperienced in developing enterprise softwarepulliMobile compatibility a plusliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongTECHNOLOGIES REQUIREDstrongpulliPHPliliReactJSliliLAMP StackliliGit or SVNliulpnbspppnbspppstrongTECHNOLOGIES HIGHLY PREFERRED strongppstrongnbspstrongpulliJava Spring SpringBootliliJavaScript jQuery Angulario ViewliliSpring MVC SpringBootliliWordPressliliGoNativeliliPush notification experience preferably with One SignalliliAmazon AWS EC2liliJira Confluence BitbucketliliVisual Studio CodeliulpnbspppnbspppstrongCANDIDATE PROFILEnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspstrongppFlexible team member organized independent strategic and analytical detailoriented effective communicator creative and lively intellect appropriate sense of urgency ability to learn new skills particularly technology ppstrongnbspstrongppstrongEDUCATIONnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspstrongppBS in Computer Science  Engineering or equivalent professional work experiencep
